Method Detail

getEntityName

public static java.lang.String getEntityName(java.lang.String tableName)
Translates table name into the class name of relative entity. For example: Input the parameter 'COMPANY_NAME', this method will return the result 'companyName'.

Parameters:
tableName - the table name in database
Returns:
the class name of BaseEntity

getFieldName

public static java.lang.String getFieldName(java.lang.String columnName)
Translates column name into the field name in relative entity class. For example: Input the parameter 'COMPANY_NAME', this method will return the result 'companyName'.

Parameters:
columnName - the column name in database
Returns:
the field name of BaseEntity Class

getTableName

public static java.lang.String getTableName(java.lang.String entityClassName)
Parses text from the given string to produce a table name that dababase understands. For example: Input the parameter 'com.walker.entity.CompanyInfo', this method will return the result 'COMPANY_INFO'.

Parameters:
entityClassName - the String object, the name of Entity Class
Returns:
the relative table name in dababase.
Throws:
IllegalEntityException

getTableName

public static java.lang.String getTableName(BaseEntity entity)
Gets the relative table name by parsing the entity object.

Parameters:
entity - BaseEntity
Returns:
the relative table name in dababase.
Throws:
IllegalEntityException

getColumnName

public static java.lang.String getColumnName(java.lang.String fieldName)
Parses text from the given string to produce a column name that dababase understands. For example: Input the parameter 'companyName', this method will return the result 'COMPANY_NAME'.

Parameters:
fieldName - the String object, the field name in entity class.
Returns:
the column name that the dababase understands.
